channel.title: RSConvival- Runescape Classic Private Server. [fast training, F2p wild]
channel.description:
[b]Convival [/b] A Runescape Classic Skilling, Staking, PKing well rounded Server.
[b]The map will consist of the free to play landscape, but still have members wilderness. The Wilderness will be Free to Play wepons, armour, items Mon-Sun. [/b] Training is at a moderate rate. (not to fast,not to slow) [b]Skilling:[/b] Skills are at an exp rate that will make out for a good Economy in the end.
-Remmington town is made for fletching and training. -Fishing- in barbarian village, draynour, karamja island-with option to get to guild, and a spot in Falador. -Crafting- there is a Guild that has a Certer inside inside to help hurry along Experience. -Herblaw- has a couple spots atm to get herbs, Thugs and Chaos druids. -Thieving has a cake stall in Varrock, nature and blood rune chests in Al Kharid. Falador has white knights and paladins
to steal from.
[b]Overall world: As convienient as possible.[/b]
Global chat log on the bottom right of the screen. Magic Portals: for easy access Teleports into the different wilderness areas. Adventerurs: for easy access into different towns around the map. God Spells are implemented and working. Pking sidestat menu. Ruby and diamond ammies with the ability to take you to wilderness Hotspots. Chaos Bank in the Wilderness for fast banking. Some mith, addy, and rune wepons and armours dropped from monsters and sold in stores.
Come try it out, if you liked Classic I believe you would like to try this Server. [url=http://Convival.punbb-hosting.com]Convival.punbb-hosting.com[/url]>> Register to see Forums and get the Client Download.
Thanks for looking we'll see ya. :)
**Some Pictures below**

Underneath edgeville:


MAGICAL POOLS
Teleports from the Magical Pool are – Edgeville, Bandit Camp, Graveyard, Greater Lair, and Lava Maze.

King Black Dragon Lair:

Remington fletching and starter spot:

Come try it out and post all suggestions on why this server is good

item.title: RSConvival- Runescape Classic Private Server. [fast training, F2p wild]
item.dc:creator: @NoLives NoLives
item.description:
@NoLives wrote:

[quote=“matty matt, post:7, topic:456076”][quote author=NoLives link=topic=559019.msg4087275#msg4087275 date=1345994524]

same Matt who had " Classic " server ?

Yes sir.[quote author=Stunninhigh link=topic=559019.msg4087099#msg4087099 date=1345963459]
Anybody trying this out?

A handful have tried it out. just released ")[quote author=NoLives link=topic=559019.msg4087153#msg4087153 date=1345970837]
sounds like rsce with the swapping between f2p/p2p.
make it one or the other, not both.
[/quote]
People like to have a change up for the weekend to p2p. personally I like the f2p best, but the change would keep others happy.
[/quote]wellp, in that case, it’s not for me.
[/quote]
over having 2 days of the wilderness a week being p2p? I don’t think you should be so hard on it as people like to use supers, dragon, godspells. It is only for 2 days. I possibly may revise it to all f2p now that you say this and then there will just be some cases if wanted by the people where the wilderness is p2p.[/quote]yes yes, but I can’t be bothered to hoard 2 sets of food/pots/armor.

Read full topic

item.title: RSConvival- Runescape Classic Private Server. [fast training, F2p wild]
item.dc:creator: @matty_matt matty matt
item.description:
@matty_matt wrote:

Convival
A Runescape Classic Skilling, Staking, PKing well rounded Server.

The map will consist of the free to play landscape, but still have members wilderness.
The Wilderness will be Free to Play wepons, armour, items Mon-Sun.

Training is at a moderate rate. (not to fast,not to slow)
Skilling: Skills are at an exp rate that will make out for a good Economy in the end.

-Remmington town is made for fletching and training.
-Fishing- in barbarian village, draynour, karamja island-with option to get to guild, and a spot in Falador.
-Crafting- there is a Guild that has a Certer inside inside to help hurry along Experience.
-Herblaw- has a couple spots atm to get herbs, Thugs and Chaos druids.
-Thieving has a cake stall in Varrock, nature and blood rune chests in Al Kharid. Falador has white knights and paladins

to steal from.

Overall world: As convienient as possible.

Global chat log on the bottom right of the screen.
Magic Portals: for easy access Teleports into the different wilderness areas.
Adventerurs: for easy access into different towns around the map.
God Spells are implemented and working.
Pking sidestat menu.
Ruby and diamond ammies with the ability to take you to wilderness Hotspots.
Chaos Bank in the Wilderness for fast banking.
Some mith, addy, and rune wepons and armours dropped from monsters and sold in stores.

Come try it out, if you liked Classic I believe you would like to try this Server.
Convival.punbb-hosting.com>> Register to see Forums and get the
Client Download.

Thanks for looking we’ll see ya.

Some Pictures below
